Structure# NSTableColumn.ResizingOptions

macOS

```
struct ResizingOptions
```

## [Topics](/documentation/AppKit/NSTableColumn/ResizingOptions#topics)

### [Initializers](/documentation/AppKit/NSTableColumn/ResizingOptions#Initializers)

[`init(rawValue: UInt)`](/documentation/appkit/nstablecolumn/resizingoptions/init(rawvalue:))### [Constants](/documentation/AppKit/NSTableColumn/ResizingOptions#Constants)

[`static var autoresizingMask: NSTableColumn.ResizingOptions`](/documentation/appkit/nstablecolumn/resizingoptions/autoresizingmask)Allows the table column to resize automatically in response to resizing the table view. The resizing behavior for the table view is set using the `NSTableView` method [`columnAutoresizingStyle`](/documentation/appkit/nstableview/columnautoresizingstyle-swift.property).[`static var userResizingMask: NSTableColumn.ResizingOptions`](/documentation/appkit/nstablecolumn/resizingoptions/userresizingmask)Allows the table column to be resized by the user.## [Relationships](/documentation/AppKit/NSTableColumn/ResizingOptions#relationships)

[`class NSTableHeaderView`](/documentation/appkit/nstableheaderview)An object that draws headers over a table viewâ€™s columns and handles mouse events in those headers.[`class NSTableHeaderCell`](/documentation/appkit/nstableheadercell)An object that a table header view uses to draw the content of the column headers.[`class NSTableRowView`](/documentation/appkit/nstablerowview)The view shown for a row in a table view.[`class NSTableColumn`](/documentation/appkit/nstablecolumn)The display characteristics and identifier for a column in a table view.[`class NSTableViewRowAction`](/documentation/appkit/nstableviewrowaction)A single action to present when the user swipes horizontally on a table row.
